description: ABOUT THIS PRODUCT: HYBRID APPAREL - Peanuts - Turkey Tasting Crew - Women's Raglan Graphic T-ShirtFrom the best-loved comic strip in history comes officially licensed PEANUTS apparel for fans everywhere. PEANUTS speaks a universal language and has introduced a vocabulary all its own, such as “Good grief!,” “security blanket,” “You blockhead!” and “Happiness is… .” Show your love for Charlie Brown, Snoopy, Lucy, Linus, Pigpen and the whole gang. These items make a great gift for anyone in the family, including your aspiring astronaut with the PEANUTS Worldwide x NASA partnership . Find products from “Snoopy in Space” and "The Snoopy Show" among other iconic images of the whole gang from feature films and hundreds of books. Copyright PeanutsOUR METHOD - We print your order on demand at our centrally located printing facility in Columbus, OH, USA. We print using high quality, sustainable, water-based inks that are safe for children and adults alike.CUSTOMER SERVICE - We strive to provide top quality t-shirts, tanks, sweatshirts and more to our customers. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your order, please contact us so we can make it right for you.ABOUT HYBRID APPAREL - Founded in 1997, Hybrid Apparel is the leading full-service design, development, sourcing, production and apparel distribution company based in Cypress, California. Hybrid has a world-class sourcing and global supply chain infrastructure, with expertise in customer delivery and service across a wide range of apparel categories and geographies. As the industry leader in brand and licensing management, Hybrid supports the best global and national brands as well as global licensed properties across media and entertainment, music, gaming, food & beverage, auto, lifestyle and more.
